body.name: Coop Home Goods Eden Bed Pillow Queen Size for Sleeping on Back, Stomach and Side Sleeper- Medium Soft Memory Foam Cooling Gel - CertiPUR-US/GREENGUARD Gold

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Coop Home Goods Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: LOOK NO FURTHER, HOT SLEEPERS - Your search for the perfect adjustable pillow has come to an end. The Eden features our soft, gel-infused memory foam & microfiber fill blend for a cooler sleep experience and a gusseted design for edge-to-edge support.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE, YOU ARE IN CONTROL – Experiencing pain, snoring or tossing and turning are all signs of sleeping wrong. Our unique adjustable design allows you to access the memory foam fill, which you can add or take off to suit your size, shape or sleep position. SLEEP RIGHT!

IS YOUR PILLOW GREEN GUARD GOLD CERTIFIED? – Our Coop Home Goods Eden Pillows undergo strict, third-party lab testing and are CertiPUR-US and GREENGUARD Gold certified to ensure safety and quality. No harmful elements here! IT`S 100% SAFE FOR YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES. Vegan & Cruelty Free – no animals were harmed in the making of this awesome pillow.

WE CARE – ONLY THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS USED! - The case is made with proprietary Lulltra fabric, a blend of polyester and rayon that provides breathability and softness. Premium materials let you finally wake up refreshed. Unlike other pillows – we freshly manufacture our foam instead of using repurposed materials. A bonus ½ lb bag of fill is included with your order if you need a higher loft.
We used imported materials. Unlike other pillows – we freshly manufacture our foam instead of using repurposed materials. A bonus ½ lb bag of fill is included with your order.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Wash in cold water. Gentle cycle. Do not use fabric softner or bleach. Tumble dry low. Ensure cover is completely dry before use. Secure the zipper closed with a safety pin to ensure inner pillow does not open or spill fill during wash. Wash in cold water. Gentle cycle. Do not use fabric softner or bleach. Tumble dry low. Ensure inner pillow is completely dry before use. Alwasy separate the removable cover from the inner pillow before wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The adjustability of this pillow is the ticket!
reviews.reviewText: I was finally able to get it right with this pillow! I had tried multiple pillows including Purple Harmony, Sleep Comfort Plush Ultimate, and Big brand and could not find a comfortable sleep. I would end up with neckaches and headaches.However, this pillow works! The adjustability is the key! I appreciate that they offer instructions about how to get the right loft and how your body should be aligned while sleeping. I followed those instructions using my smartphone camera to check the alignment, and then I adjusted over a few days taking out a bit more poof here and there until I got it right. I also appreciate that there is a firmer side and a softer side to this pillow. I realized the firmer side works best for me and gives me the best support while still being cushiony soft at the right loft.This is my first crescent pillow. It took a few days to get used to it, but it works quite well for my side sleeping. It enables me to snuggle deeper into the pillow. I'm not sure that I can ever go back to a regular pillow for side sleeping after this one. I also find the cooling of the Eden+ to be real. The cooling doesn't last long, but it definitely feels cool to the touch when I initially lay my head on it.I actually ended up buying a second Coop pillow because I realized I need a different loft when lying on my back reading, meditating, or on my tablet. This typically occurs before I go to sleep and after I wake up in the morning. I got the regular Eden pillow and adjusted it to a good loft for lying on my back. Thus, I sleep with the regular Eden pillow adjusted for my back as I'm reading before i go to sleep. Once I can no longer keep my eyes open, I switch to the Eden+ crescent pillow for sleeping on my side.Finally, I let the pillow air out after opening but went ahead and slept on it the first night. I then let it continue airing out the second day. I did not have major issues with foam smell.I am glad to have found this very customizable pillow and some relief for my neck and back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but Worth It
reviews.reviewText: I have had this pillow for two weeks and that has been enough time to realize this is exactly what I needed. I am a hybrid back and side sleeper. I usually fall asleep on my side and move to my back in the night.I was having intense neck pain and decided I needed something. The 100 day return window (which I am still within) was the main reason I decided to try such an expensive pillow. If it didn't work or fit me, I could always return it for a full refund.The shape:The shape is incredibly unique and tailored to how I sleep. The winged arms make it easy to get comfortable on your side. Then naturally when I move onto my back I have a traditional pillow that doesn't get bunched under my neck and shoulders causing me pain in the morning. Just a supportive slope to keep my spine at a relatively straight alignment.The Filling:The fact that you can add or remove the filling is a great feature that will help improve the longevity of the pillow for me. While also allowing me to remove some of the initial stuffing to get the exact fit I wanted. I wish more pillows made this as easy as they are on this pillow. They even include recommendations based on your sleeping style how to leave it stuffed. The filling is designed to cool and not build up heat. Its currently autumn, so I am unable to determine if the cooling is all it is cracked up to be, but I am not finding that I am overheating at night which is new.Overall, its expensive but seems to be worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My receipts from Amazon, Kohl's, and Macy's reflect the vast amount of pillows I've tried and returned over the course of 3 weeks - over 12 different brands/styles - plus going into the Purple store to try out their various pillows (I'm not a fan of 10 lb pillows!!). I've tried numerous goose-down pillows (over $160), down alternate pillows & memory foam (and whatever is in the Purple pillows). NONE of them compare to the soft, luxurious yet supportive features of this Coop Eden Pillow!! I'm a tiny petite woman and sleep both on my back & and my side. Most of the other pillows were just too lofty for my small stature (giving me a headache upon waking in the morning). The down pillows weren't too lofty, but they fill with displaced air on both sides of your head that slowly decompresses - but they're not very supportive and certainly not springy once they compress and once settling, aren't very soft and inviting. The Eden pillow is everything I craved- soft as a cloud yet supportive - super malleable, springy/squishy!! I did have to remove a lot of fill (again, I'm a super tiny human), but how wonderful to be able to adjust a pillow to fit your physical size and comfort desires??!! After all of my hard work in buying, trying out, and returning a LOT of other pillows, I'm so happy to have found the Coop Eden pillow it is truly dreamy perfection!!One other thing - I've read some reviews where people have detected a scent from the memory foam... I have a very sensitive sense of smell and detected NO scent- even when taking some of the foam out of my pillow.KEY FEATURES:1. ADJUSTABLE LOFT2. SOFT as a CLOUD3. MALLEABLE, SPRINGY/SQUISHY4. SUPPORTIVE5. NOT TOO HEAVY6. MACHINE WASHABLE7. LUXURIOUS DREAMY FEELING

reviews.reviewTitle: Near perfect and worth the money if you‘re “comfort-challenged” like myself
reviews.reviewText: I’m very picky about pillows. Here are my criteria:1. It needs to be soft on the outside. I’m prone to ear/jaw pressure pain, and depending on the night, firm pillows can feel like I’m sleeping on a brick. So it has to fall just within that softness threshold.2. At the same time it as to be supportive at the core, and have a bit of bounce to it, and not sink all the way into the mattress.3. I sleep hot, so it has to be breathable.4. It needs to be configurable enough to have a high-enough loft in case I want to sleep on my side, but can squish down if I want to roll over onto my stomach or back — because on top of all my other challenges, I sleep in all 3 positions equally!My old down alternative pillow which I had for 15 years, ticked all of those boxes. I don’t even remember where I bought it or what the brand was, but then one day my spouse decided to wash it, and it turned into a lumpy sack of marbles! The tag was completely worn away so I couldn’t even find the make; I suffered with that thing for another year before I started questing for a replacement, and I was surprised how challenging that was. I tried several but nothing came close, and meanwhile I was waking up with headaches most mornings, the side of my head just felt squashed and raw, and I was just not getting enough sleep. It was torture.Finally it came down to the Coop Eden, or the Purple Harmony. Both tick almost all the boxes, but each has a drawback — the Purple Harmony’s rubber grid material can be rough on sensitive ears, but it’s very cool; whereas the Eden has enough give to spare the side of my head, but can get warm despite what the product description says about cooling gel.Ultimate I went with the latter, because there’s a workaround for its one drawback: Coop sells a very effective cooling pillowcase, the combination of which is almost perfect. It feels immediately cool, and while it won’t keep the spot you’re lying on cool forever, it does magically prevent it from getting excessively warm. Moreover if you move away from the spot, it will cool down again very quickly — meaning that you can just move to cooler spots on the pillow every few mins until you fall asleep and no longer care, and not wake up in a sweat!I’ve only had it for a couple days, but there’s no adjustment period. I knew the moment I tried it I’d finally found a replacement for my old perfect pillow. For the first time in ages, I had a really great sleep and didn’t wake up with a neck/head ache. This thing’s a game changer, especially if you’re a difficult customer like myself.One other thing to note: Reviewers have reported a chemical smell, and mine had a bit of that even after putting it through the drier as instructed, but weirdly, it smells almost like chocolate! Maybe it would have been worse had I not tumble dried it first, but I actually kind of don’t mind it! And my wife independently verified the chocolate scent as well when I asked her what she thought it smelled like. I suspect it will fade over the next few days, but at least in the meantime I’m having sweet dreams!

reviews.reviewTitle: Now having a good night's sleep. :)
reviews.reviewText: Great pillow, have been having problem sleeping well. With this customizable pillow, the density of the pillow can be adjusted to suit my sleeping posture.

It is very good. Adjustable to the level you need. Material is good and easy to fluff up. It is not for firm pillow lover though. I didn’t experience bad smell and there is plenty of stuffing that I could have made 2 more pillows. Sadly my neck still need a different type of pillow that is firmer but I can give this one to my dad.

I'd consider this to be expensive for a pillow, but originally I didn't know what type of pillow I needed as I sleep in all positions (due to having old, terrible pillows). I like the fact that you can pull the filler out (and it fits in the extra filler bag that they provide!). My one recommendation, if you do need to pull any filler out, make sure you pull it out across the entire length of the pillow. I pulled out the middle section and for a night or two there was a massive dip in the middle no matter how much I 'floofed' the pillow, but it sorted itself out after that!

I have been searching for a new pillow for yearsThis one is the one. The fact that i can fill and remove stuffing makes all the differenceThis is not a firm pillow but had good supportMy partner doesn't like it but he prefers hard menory foamI love it
